name: Bauble's Gate
description:
Your name is Brussel Sproutling and you have a task ahead: collect baubles and bring them to your boss to earn a living.

Space - shake tree

Shift - toggle holster

R - reload

WASD - movement

The team
  • Miguel - pixelart and sound design
  • Stuart - 3d artist
  • Jade - composer
  • Adam - programmer
  • Ahmed - producer
